project.name: LanbWeb
project.build:
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin
repackage
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-maven-plugin
true
org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-maven-plugin 1.3.5
mysql mysql-connector-java 5.1.46
<^!--解决xml文件缺失 -->
src/main/java
**/*.xml
<^!-- 是否替换资源中的属性 --> false
project.parent: org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-parent 2.0.2.RELEASE <^!-- lookup parent from repository -->
project.dependencies:
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-web
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-freemarker
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-test test
<^!-- MyBatis -->
org.mybatis.spring.boot mybatis-spring-boot-starter 1.3.1
mysql mysql-connector-java runtime
org.mybatis mybatis-spring 1.3.0
<^!--热部署 -->
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-devtools true
<^!-- 分页插件 -->
com.github.pagehelper pagehelper-spring-boot-starter 1.2.3
<^!-- MBG --> <^!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.mybatis.generator/mybatis-generator-core -->
org.mybatis.generator mybatis-generator-core 1.3.5
<^!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.alibaba/fastjson -->
com.alibaba fastjson 1.2.47
<^!--slf4j -->
org.projectlombok lombok
<^!-- 处理表格 --> <^!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.poi/poi -->
org.apache.poi poi 3.17
<^!--shiro -->
org.apache.shiro shiro-spring 1.3.2
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-configuration-processor true
<^!-- aop -->
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-aop
<^!-- org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-data-redis -->
<^!-- redisSession共享集成 -->
org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-redis 1.4.7.RELEASE
org.springframework.session spring-session-data-redis
